scoreDescription.five-metric: Result is measured in five-point scale:
scoreDescription.excellent-5: 优：4.0~5.0；评价：很好，听得清楚；延迟小，交流流畅
scoreDescription.good-5: 良：3.5~4.0；评价：稍差，听得清楚；延迟小，交流欠流畅，有点杂音
scoreDescription.medium-5: 中：3.0~3.5；评价：还可以，听不太清；有一定延迟，可以交流
scoreDescription.bad-5: 差：1.5~3.0；评价：勉强，听不太清；延迟较大，交流需要重复多遍
scoreDescription.worse-5: 劣：0~1.5；评价：极差，听不懂；延迟大，交流不通畅
scoreDescription.db: The result is expressed in dB, higher is better.
scoreDescription.dimensionless: The result dimensionless correlation coefficient, higher is better. 0=very bad, 1=very good.
